author: Rob Waugh For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Facebook Down â€“ news feed not working for many and people are losing it! | Metro News
text:
Rob Waugh for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 9:40 am 
Picture: Facebook / Metro 
Chaos has engulfed the world as Facebook has stopped working for many users â€“ with affected people unable to access News Feed. 
Not only that, but the social network is accusing everyone of not having enough friends. 
Website Down Detector shows that the problem is widespread in Europe â€“ although not all users are affected. 
When users scroll down, they see a message, â€˜Youâ€™ll have more stories in News Feed if you add more friends.â€™ 
Naturally, users are furious, and have taken to Twitter to complain, vent and moan. Facebook is downâ€¦ Deep breaths, keep calmâ€¦ ðŸ˜§ #Facebook pic.twitter.com/rqxkGYogSo 
â€” Ian Evans ï£¿ (@ianmorganevans) February 22, 2017 @facebook news feed is down in the uk, saying retry no stories to show 
â€” John Goddard (@jiege01) February 22, 2017 
Facebook has yet to comment about the outages. More
